      • onConnected

        public void onConnected()
        Called after the LocationEngine is activated. Good to request location updates at this point.
        Specified by:
        onConnected in interface com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LocationEngineListener
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • onLocationChanged

        public void onLocationChanged(Location location)
        Fired when the LocationEngine updates.

        This activity will check launch data here (if we didn't have a location when the map was ready). Once the first location update is received, a new route can be retrieved from NavigationRoute.

        Specified by:
        onLocationChanged in interface com.mapbox.services.android.telemetry.location.LocationEngineListener
        Parameters:
        location - used to retrieve route with bearing
